backend/main.mo: Actor managing blob storage, user profiles with access control, and CRUD-style product storage and queries by category.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent site updates like About Us and Home page sections.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of multiple frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the frontend app and mounting the root React element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes, global providers, theming, and main layout for the React application.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by validating admin session state and handling connectivity issues before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagePicke: Image upload component that validates, compresses, previews, and outputs ExternalBlob values for product images.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for creating or editing products, managing form state, validation, and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductTab: Displays products in a table with edit and delete actions, plus dialogs for editing and confirming deletion.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Hero section showing DailyKart branding, tagline, feature badges, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/branding/HomeRks: Static contact block showing brand name, address, and phone number.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartProvide: Context provider exposing cart state and actions via useCart and supplying them to children.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, tagline, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation, cart badge, mobile menu handling, and admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper combining header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders a titled product section with a grid or empty message.
Tabs component for switching between all, food, and grocery product categories.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Card displaying product details with add-to-cart and WhatsApp order actions.
Responsive grid layout rendering product cards for a list of products.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state using React Query, handling token storage, validation, and login mutations with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/cart/useCart.ts: Provides cart state with sessionStorage persistence and actions to modify items, quantities, and compute totals.
frontend/src/hooks/products/useProductMu: Defines create, update, and delete product mutations requiring admin authentication and invalidating product queries.
Fetches all product summaries via the actor with retry logic and loading state integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing DailyKart, its service area, and various policies.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin view for managing products with add dialog, product table, and logout handling.
Admin login form with validation, error normalization, and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, removal, subtotal, and navigation to checkout, handling empty-cart state.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles customer details form, validates input, builds WhatsApp order link, and clears cart after submission.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPanelPage.tsx: Shows menu with category filter, product loading states, and contact block for customers.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListingPage.ts: Lists all products grouped by category with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/types/cart.ts: Defines cart item, state, and action interfaces for managing cart operations.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthErrors.ts: Normalizes admin authentication errors by extracting raw messages and categorizing them into invalid credentials, connectivity issues, or system errors.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Validates image uploads for type and size and provides a function to compress images via canvas before upload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support, including hashâ€‘based routing handling.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp order URLs for single products or full cart orders, formatting customer details and item lists.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, issues, branding changes, and architectural notes for the DailyKart app.
